definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: Each line, inadvertently are bathed in flowers.
sentences.chinese: 每行一处，不经意间便沐浴在了花香之中。

sentences.english: Don't try to hard:the neconsumedst things come when you least expect them to.
sentences.chinese: 英语不要焦心，最好的总会在最不经意的时间展现。

sentences.english: Only in the dark will ring inadvertently substituted.
sentences.chinese: 只是在不经意间暗将年轮偷换。

sentences.english: When leaving the temple, inadvertently looked up and saw a spider on the beam.
sentences.chinese: 离开寺庙的时候，不经意间抬头看见了横梁上的蛛蛛。

sentences.english: Sometimes the best ideas come to us when we're not focused on finding the best ideas.
sentences.chinese: 有时候一些金点子都是在我们不经意间突发灵感的。

sentences.english: As he came close and lit the match, his eyes inadvertently locked with line.
sentences.chinese: 在他靠近并递过火柴时，他的眉头不经意的皱了皱。

sentences.english: Don't hurry, the best always come out casualness.
sentences.chinese: 不要着急，最好的总会在最不经意的时候出现。

sentences.english: Don't try to hard. the ide's thing to dos come when you least expect them to.
sentences.chinese: 不要焦心，最好的总会在最不经意的光阴展现。

sentences.english: Sometimes one casual favour could turn out one eternal warmness in someone's heart.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，我们不经意的恩惠会永恒的温暖某个人的心。

sentences.english: It's surprising how much of memory is buit around things unnoticed at the time.
sentences.chinese: 在我们不经意间留下了多少的记忆是另人惊讶的。

sentences.english: I like the idea of serendipitous broadcasting.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢“不经意式广播”这个主意。

sentences.english: Don't try to hard, the best things come when you least  expect them to.
sentences.chinese: 少安毋躁，最好的总会在最不经意的时候出现。

sentences.english: The word “evil” is tossed around carelessly.
sentences.chinese: “邪恶”这个词被不经意的乱用。

sentences.english: HuHuman often at nonchalant time only will then understand.
sentences.chinese: 人往往在不经意的时候才会懂得。

sentences.english: How time flies! While welcoming the new year and saying goodbye to the past year, we become one year older.
sentences.chinese: 时间真快，在迎来送往中我们不经意又长了一岁。

sentences.english: The sunshine falls casually, all the slight brightness are floating in the room.
sentences.chinese: 阳光不经意间坠落，一室的清辉便浮动起来。

definition: not a word or movement (idiom); remaining calm and collected/not batting an eyelid
